verses.kjv: Give ear to my words, O LORD, consider my meditation.
verses.ct: Pay attention to my words, LORD; think about what weighs on my heart.

verses.kjv: Hearken unto the voice of my cry, my King, and my God: for unto thee will I pray.
verses.ct: Listen to my desperate cry, my King and my God, because I am bringing my prayer to you.

verses.kjv: My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O LORD; in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.
verses.ct: You will hear me in the morning, LORD; each morning I will lay my prayer before you and wait expectantly.

verses.kjv: For thou art not a God that hath pleasure in wickedness: neither shall evil dwell with thee.
verses.ct: You are not a God who takes pleasure in evil; wickedness has no place with you.

verses.kjv: The foolish shall not stand in thy sight: thou hatest all workers of iniquity.
verses.ct: The arrogant cannot stand in your presence; you despise everyone who practices wrongdoing.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt destroy them that speak leasing: the LORD will abhor the bloody and deceitful man.
verses.ct: You will destroy those who tell lies; the LORD detests violent and dishonest people.

verses.kjv: But as for me, I will come into thy house in the multitude of thy mercy: and in thy fear will I worship toward thy holy temple.
verses.ct: But because of your abundant mercy, I will enter your house; with deep reverence for you, I will worship facing your holy temple.

verses.kjv: Lead me, O LORD, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.
verses.ct: Guide me, LORD, in your righteousness because of those who oppose me; make your path clear ahead of me.

verses.kjv: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue.
verses.ct: There is nothing honest in what they say; their hearts are full of destruction; their throats are like open tombs; they use their words to manipulate.

verses.kjv: Destroy thou them, O God; let them fall by their own counsels; cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions; for they have rebelled against thee.
verses.ct: Hold them accountable, God; let their own schemes bring them down. Drive them out because of their many sins, for they have defied you.

verses.kjv: But let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice: let them ever shout for joy, because thou defendest them: let them also that love thy name be joyful in thee.
verses.ct: But let everyone who trusts in you celebrate; let them shout with joy forever, because you protect them. Let those who love your name be filled with happiness because of you.

verses.kjv: For thou, LORD, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield.
verses.ct: Because you, LORD, bless those who do right; you surround them with favor like a shield.
